mapper.select:
select
from sys_battery_device_model sbdm
1=1
and sbdm.name like "%"#{name}"%"
and sbdm.unit_id = #{unitId}
and sbdm.total_elec_capacity like "%"#{totalElecCapacity}"%"
and sbdm.capacity_density like "%"#{capacityDensity}"%"
order by sbdm.create_time desc
